title: (x) Rick Griffin Flying Eyeball poster - (similar to) Hendrix {Jan}
content: It's not a font. Every bit of it was lettered by Griffin in his own unique style. It's possible that there are fonts inspired by his lettering, but I can't think of any. Some art nouveau fonts have a similar feel, but not the wild, hallucinogenic quality.
author: Mark Simonson

comments.content:
There's at least one font inspired by the lettering. Suprisingly, it's called   
 [Hendrix](http://web.archive.org/web/20050515203738/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/scriptorium/hendrix/hendrix/testdrive.html?s=jimi+hendrix&p=72)
